misdeed: A series of disturbing incidents has plagued the local church.  Hymnals are found ripped to shreds, candles extinguish with a hiss, and a pervasive feeling of dread hangs over the sanctuary.  Parishioners whisper of a demonic presence lurking within the hallowed halls.
solution: The Vaesen is a Church Grim and can be destroyed by finding its remains buried within the church walls, breaking them open, and burning the carcass.

clues.description: The disturbances are always worse during religious ceremonies, as if mocking the sanctity of the rituals.
A faint, sulfurous odor clings to the air, particularly near the altar.
A local boy claims to have seen a large, black dog with glowing red eyes watching him from the shadows beneath the choir loft.
An old, forgotten crypt beneath the church is discovered, containing the skeletal remains of an animal buried with strange rituals and offerings.
The church's bell begins to toll at odd hours, seemingly of its own accord.
The priest notices that the communion wine tastes sour, as if tainted by an unseen force.

plotTwist.description: A disgruntled former altar boy, harboring resentment towards the church, unknowingly awakened the Vaesen while attempting to vandalize the sanctuary.
